hooks.prompt: Check if ~/.claude/memory-keeper/sessions/ exists. If it does, read the 3 most recent .md files for the current project (files starting with the current directory name) and briefly summarize the context. If no sessions exist, say nothing. Be very brief (max 200 tokens).

Save a session summary to ~/.claude/memory-keeper/sessions/ with filename [PROJECT_NAME]_[YYYY-MM-DD_HH-MM].md where PROJECT_NAME is the current directory name. Include: 1) Project path 2) Files changed 3) Key decisions 4) Discoveries 5) Next steps. Max 500 tokens. Create the directory if it doesn't exist.
